formulas.name: Formula_ServResourceConfirmedGotChqCash
formulas.expression: {!var_ServiceResourceData.FirstName__c} & " " & {!var_ServiceResourceData.LastName__c} & " Confirmed they received a Chq or Cash."

formulas.name: Formula_ServResourceNOTConfirmedGotChqCash
formulas.expression: {!var_ServiceResourceData.FirstName__c} & " " & {!var_ServiceResourceData.LastName__c} & " confirmed they did NOT receive a Chq or Cash."

screens.name: CashCustPresPayDevice_Payment_Rec_Created_5_Secs_Not_Passed
screens.label: CashCustPresPayDevice Payment Rec Created 5 Secs Not Passed

fields.name: DisplayTxt5SecsNotPass1
fields.fieldText:
5 seconds have not passed yet.

Please press next when 5 seconds have passed.

Please wait until: {!var_CashCustPresPayDevice_5_Secs_Wait}

screens.name: Screen_so_that_eCommerce_URL_can_be_displayed_retrieved
screens.label: Screen so that eCommerce URL can be displayed/retrieved

fields.name: DisplayTxtClickNextforURL
fields.fieldText: Please click Next to display the URL to click on for the Customer to enter new card details.

fields.name: DisplayTxtAlternativeCreditCardSuccessful
fields.fieldText: Payment has been successfully collected from the customer. Your service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

fields.name: DisplayTxtAlternativeCreditCardUNSuccessful
fields.fieldText:
Your service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete but payment remains outstanding.

Please press Next to select an alternative payment method.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentStage
fields.fieldText:
The current payment stage is: {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}

Please press Next to see if payment stage changes to: Collected from customer

*If this doesnt happen after several attempts (can take up to 30 seconds) please use the exit payment option below to exit the payment process. You must contact the office to confirm payment was successful.

fields.name: Exit_Payment_please_check_with_Office_payment_was_received
fields.fieldText: Exit Payment

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvNotFoundPayviadevice
fields.fieldText:
Service appointment {!var_ServApptData.AppointmentNumber} status is updated to Visit Complete but customer invoice cannot be found.

Payment cannot be taken at this time and is outstanding.

Please take a screen shot of this message and contact the office.

screens.name: ScreenCustInvoiceNotFound_Pay_via_device_Credit_Customer_CI_Not_Found
screens.label: CustInvoiceNotFound (Pay via device) (Credit Customer) CI Not Found

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvNotFoundWontPayviadeviceCreditCustomerCINotFound
fields.fieldText:
Service appointment {!var_ServApptData.AppointmentNumber} status is updated to Visit Complete but customer invoice cannot be found.

Payment cannot be taken at this time and is outstanding.

Please take a screen shot of this message and contact the office.

(Credit Customer)

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvNotFoundWontPayviadevice
fields.fieldText:
Service appointment {!var_ServApptData.AppointmentNumber} status is updated to Visit Complete but customer invoice cannot be found.

Payment cannot be taken at this time and is outstanding.

Please take a screen shot of this message and contact the office.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustomer_Invoice_Not_Found2
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_After_Attempt_2_Cust_not_present
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found After Attempt 2 Cust not present

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFound_AfterAttempt2_CustNotPresent
fields.fieldText: We still cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again one last time.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_After_Attempt_2_Pay_via_device
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found After Attempt 2 (Pay via device)

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFound_AfterAttempt2Payviadevice
fields.fieldText: We still cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again one last time.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_After_Attempt_2_Pay_via_device_Credit_Customer
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found After Attempt 2 (Pay via device) (Credit Customer)

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFound_AfterAttempt2WontPayviadeviceCreditCustomer
fields.fieldText: We still cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again one last time.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_After_Attempt_2_Wont_Pay_via_device
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found After Attempt 2 (Wont Pay via device)

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFound_AfterAttempt2WontPayviadevice
fields.fieldText: We still cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again one last time.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustomer_Invoice_Not_Found2CreditCustomer
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_Pay_via_device
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found (Pay via device)

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFoundPayviadevice
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again.

screens.name: ScreenCustomer_Invoice_not_found_wont_pay_via_device
screens.label: Customer Invoice not found (wont pay via device)

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFoundWontPayviadevice
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish_CustWontPayOnDevice
fields.fieldText:
An email requesting payment has been sent to the customer.

Service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

Please press Next to end the payment process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFirst4DigitsVerification_FAILED
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The first 4 digits entered do not match the {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}.

Please press Next to either enter the first 4 digits again or choose another payment method.

fields.name: DisplayTxt_eCommerceURL
fields.fieldText:
Please click on the link below to add alternative credit card details:

{!var_PaymentData.asp04__eCommerce_URL__c}

And then return to the mobile app and click Next to confirm if payment was taken successfully or not.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFirst4DigitsVerification
fields.fieldText: For security please pass the phone to the customer to enter the first 4 digits of the {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}. Payment amount: £{!var_CustomerInvoiceData.Charge_Gross__c}.

fields.name: Please_enter_the_first_4_digits_of_your_card_number
fields.fieldText: Please enter the first 4 digits of your card number:

fields.name: Is_the_Customer_present_to_take_payment
fields.fieldText: Is the customer present to take payment?

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_select
fields.fieldText: Please select:

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentOptionNotMade
fields.fieldText: A payment option was not made - please press Next to return to the previous screen.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentProcessExited
fields.fieldText:
The payment process was exited. Please check with the office that the payment went through successfully.

Service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete but payment is outstanding.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentRecordCreated
fields.fieldText: A Payment record is created for £{!var_CustomerInvoiceData.Charge_Gross__c}. To complete the payment and check its status please wait 5 seconds and then press Next.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentStage_Failed
fields.fieldText:
The payment process stage is {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}.

Please press Next to select alternative payment method.

screens.name: ScreenPayment_Stage_is_Not_Collected_From_Customer
screens.label: Payment Stage is Not Collected From Customer

fields.name: DisplayTxtNotCollectedFromCust
fields.fieldText:
Payment stage is currently: {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}.

Please press Next to search again or toggle 'Exit payment loop' to exit this process if not successful after a few attempts.

fields.name: ChkbxExit_payment_loop
fields.fieldText: Exit payment loop

fields.name: DisplayTxtBACs_Selected
fields.fieldText:
As a BACs payment was selected please check with the office that payment was received.

Service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

﻿Please press Next to end the payment process.

fields.name: RadbtnsHave_you_received_the_cash
fields.fieldText: Have you received the cash?

fields.name: RadbtnsHave_you_received_the_cheque
fields.fieldText: Have you received the cheque?

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish
fields.fieldText:
As a cheque payment was selected please ensure this is passed onto the office.

Service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

Please press Next to end the payment process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish_Cash
fields.fieldText:
As a cash payment was selected please ensure this is passed onto the office.

Service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

Please press Next to end the payment process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentSuccessfullyTaken
fields.fieldText:
Payment has been successfully collected from the customer.

Your service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

screens.name: ScreenPlease_select_alternative_method_of_payment
screens.label: Please select alternative method of payment

fields.name: PicklsitPlease_select_alternative_payment_method
fields.fieldText: Please select alternative payment method

fields.name: DisplayTxtValidAuthFound
fields.fieldText:
We have a {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card on file ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}.

Does the customer wish to process £{!var_CustomerInvoiceData.Charge_Gross__c} on this card?

fields.name: PicklistPlease_choose_PayUsingAuthOrNot
fields.fieldText: Please choose

fields.name: DisplayTxtVisitComplete_0
fields.fieldText:
This account type is {!var_AccountData.Account_Type__c}.

Payment is not required.


Service appointment status updated to Visit Complete

screens.label: Visit Complete Customer Not Present Chargeable

Service Appointment {!var_ServApptData.AppointmentNumber} Status updated to Visit Complete but the Customer Invoice still cannot be found.

Please note payment is still outstanding.

Please take a screen shot of this message and contact the office.

fields.fieldText:

Please note payment is still outstanding.

screens.label: Visit Complete Customer Not Present NOT Chargeable

fields.name: DisplayTxtVisitComplete_CustomerNotPresent_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
The Customer Invoice still could not be found Service but Appointment Status updated to Visit Complete.

(Non-chargeable)

fields.name: DisplayTxtWill_Customer_pay_via_device
fields.fieldText: If the customer does not want to pay via your device please select this below and an email will be sent to them with a payment link.
